name: archive
description: List of tasks done in Web Development Technologies 1. Developed a CRUD application with one field has a variable sub-fields in size and key values using MongoDB and NodeJS. 2. Developed an application that sends data to all the connected clients as soon as it receives data from a HTTP POST request using the web-socket module with NodeJS. 3. Developed an Angular 6 application that polls the server for any updates every 10 seconds.
author: pranjal
